item.title: Smitara Foudation
item.description: A nonprofit organization (NPO), also known as a nonbusiness entity[1] or nonprofit institution, and often referred to simply as a nonprofit (not followed by a noun), is a legal entity organized and operated for a collective, public or social benefit, as opposed to an entity that operates as a business aiming to generate a profit for its owners Nonprofit organizations are accountable to the donors, founders, volunteers, program recipients, and the public community.
